actions.description:
16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (2d12 + 9) force damage. If it's his turn, Yeenoghu can cause the target to suffer one of the following additional effects, each of which he can apply only once per turn

- Confusion: The target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or be affected by the confusion spell until the start of Yeenoghu's next turn.
- Force: The target takes an extra 13 (2d12) force damage.
- Paralysis: The target must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed until the start of Yeenoghu's next turn.
actions.name: Flail

actions.description: 16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (2d10 + 9) acid damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description:
Yeenoghu casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17):
At will: detect magic

1/day each: teleport

3/day each: dispel magic, fear, invisibility
actions.name: Spellcasting

actions.description: Yeenoghu moves up to his speed.
actions.name: Charge

actions.description: Yeenoghu makes one Flail attack. If the attack hits, the target must succeed on a DC 24 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 15 feet in a straight line away from Yeenoghu. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also knocked prone.
actions.name: Swat Away

actions.description: Yeenoghu makes a separate Bite attack against each creature within 10 feet of him.
actions.name: Savage (Costs 2 Actions)

damageImmunities: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing that is nonmagical
name: Yeenoghu [MoM]

specialTraits.description: If Yeenoghu fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.
specialTraits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)

specialTraits.description: Yeenoghu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
specialTraits.name: Magic Resistance
